Introduction

Chaewon is a South Korean singer under Janggoon Entertainment. She is a former member of the girl group APRIL. She made her solo debut on December 25, 2021 with the digital single "To the Memories of April". She was a contestant on KARA Project, Sing Again 3, and Girls On Fire. Chaewon also made her acting debut in the web drama "Reply Pyeongchang, 100°F” as the female lead character.

She debuted as a member of April on August 24, 2015 with the mini-album Dreaming.

On January 28, 2022, DSP Media announced that April has decided to disband after 6 years and go their separate ways.
